# QuACK: A Quirky Assortment of CuTe Kernels

## Installation

``` bash
pip install quack-kernels
```

## Requirements

- H100 or B200 GPU
- CUDA toolkit 12.9+
- Python 3.12

## Kernels

- RMSNorm forward
- Softmax forward
- Cross entropy forward


## Usage

```
from quack import rmsnorm, softmax, cross_entropy
```
